summary: An accident with ancient Dwemer technology has mutated a Nord adventurer. He now has incredible strength, but suffers as an outcast living in Brood Cavern outside of Morthal.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][color=green][FONT=Century Gothic][size=25]Announcement[/FONT][/size][/color][/u][/b]
[FONT=Verdana][size=5][color=orange]Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6132087][b]burke228[/b][/url], this mod is now part of a larger [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35490][i]Marvel Avengers Mod[/i][/url]. If you enjoyed this mod, plan to enjoy it, or just want to role-play as a superhero, remember to check out that mod.[/color][/FONT][/size]

[b][u][color=green][FONT=Century Gothic][size=25]Description (Version 1.0)[/size][/FONT][/color][/u][/b]
[FONT=Verdana][size=5]An accident with ancient Dwemer technology has mutated a Nord adventurer. He now has incredible strength, but suffers as an outcast living in Brood Cavern outside of Morthal.

[b]This follower is somewhat OP. He is not only essential, but also invulnerable (immune to all damage).[/b] This mod creates what I believe to be a very unique follower experience. The Hulk is set to use primarily extremely powerful unarmed attacks. When in combat, he will grunt like The Incredible Hulk does. On attacks, his punches emit a green explosion. Needless to say, there are cosmetic similarities to Marvel\'s The Hulk. The only real issue with this mod is that, due to his augmented size, some killmoves may appear a bit strange.

A new optional file includes [color=red]Rulk[/color]. He is based off of Hulk, but he has a few special effects exclusive to him, including new punching explosions and a special fire effect. He can also be found at Brood Cavern, a bit ironic but, what the heck, \"We\'re all friends here\"! Credits to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3110420][b]haldir307[/b][/url] for the add-on idea.[/FONT][/size]

[b][u][color=green][FONT=Century Gothic][size=25]Install[/FONT][/size][/color][/u][/b]
[FONT=Verdana][size=5]NMM can be used, or you can extract the files and paste them into your Data folder. There are only two files.[/FONT][/size]

[b][u][color=green][FONT=Century Gothic][size=25]Compatibility[/FONT][/size][/color][/u][/b]
[FONT=Verdana][size=5]This follower should not have any issues with most follower mods since this follower is considered to be a typical NPC follower.[/FONT][/size]

[b][u][color=green][FONT=Century Gothic][size=25]Credits[/FONT][/size][/color][/u][/b]
[FONT=Verdana][size=5]Credit goes to Marvel for The Incredible Hulk and to foretrenty for Skyrim NPC Editor.[/FONT][/size]

[FONT=Verdana][size=5]As always, I really appreciate comments. Also, don\'t forget to check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31809][b]Brelyna Maryon Redone[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31778][b]Dragon Aspect Ambient Sound Remover[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31693][b]Explosive Unarmed Punches[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32933][b]Fists of the Mage - Unarmed Gameplay Enhanced[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28565][b]Ice Form Weapons[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33160][b]The Golden Touch - New Spells and Effect Shaders[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28670][b]Weapon Enchantments Redone[/b][/url][/FONT][/size]
author: BrotherBob
